com.umeng.common.ui.widgets

类 BadgeView

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • android.widget.TextView
        • com.umeng.common.ui.widgets.BadgeView
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.ViewTreeObserver.OnPreDrawListener

    public class BadgeView
extends android.widget.TextView
    A simple text label view that can be applied as a "badge" to any given View. This class is intended to be instantiated at runtime rather than included in XML layouts. 需要用户调用checked() 函数来消除未读消息的红点

    • 嵌套类概要

      • increment

        public int increment(int offset)
        Increment the numeric badge label. If the current badge label cannot be converted to an integer value, its label will be set to "0".
        参数:
        offset - the increment offset.

      • decrement

        public int decrement(int offset)
        Decrement the numeric badge label. If the current badge label cannot be converted to an integer value, its label will be set to "0".
        参数:
        offset - the decrement offset.

      • setBadgeMargin

        public void setBadgeMargin(int horizontal,
                           int vertical)
        Set the horizontal/vertical margin from the target View that is applied to this badge.
        参数:
        horizontal - margin in pixels.
        vertical - margin in pixels.

      • getBadgeBackgroundColor

        public int getBadgeBackgroundColor()
        Returns the color value of the badge background.

      • setBadgeBackgroundColor

        public void setBadgeBackgroundColor(int badgeColor)
        Set the color value of the badge background.
        参数:
        badgeColor - the badge background color.

      • dispatchDraw

        protected void dispatchDraw(android.graphics.Canvas canvas)
        覆盖:
        dispatchDraw 在类中 android.view.View
